flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: I had the idea to make this alarm when I saw two mousetraps in a shop .
guide.introduction_rendered: I had the idea to make this alarm when I saw two mousetraps in a shop .

lines.text: A soldering iron , soldering , 4X AA (1,5V ) battery holder , 4X AA (1,5V) batteries , a hammer , a SPDT (single pole dubble throw) 6V relay , scisors , two screws (one longer than the other) , a few bugs , a few nails , fishing thread , one mousetrap , snippers , wire , a verry thin piece of wire , wire strippers and a firecracker (bison 1 , bison 2) or fireworks .
lines.text_raw: A soldering iron , soldering , 4X AA (1,5V ) battery holder , 4X AA (1,5V) batteries , a hammer , a SPDT (single pole dubble throw) 6V relay , scisors , two screws (one longer than the other) , a few bugs , a few nails , fishing thread , one mousetrap , snippers , wire , a verry thin piece of wire , wire strippers and a firecracker (bison 1 , bison 2) or fireworks .

lines.text: Add a bug to the back of your mousetrap (first picture)
lines.text_raw: Add a bug to the back of your mousetrap (first picture)

lines.text: then make 2 knotted curls in a 1 feet piece of fishing thread (one curl half of the size of the other) (second picture).
lines.text_raw: then make 2 knotted curls in a 1 feet piece of fishing thread (one curl half of the size of the other) (second picture).

lines.text: then attach the two pieces with the little curl and the bug (like me) (third picture)
lines.text_raw: then attach the two pieces with the little curl and the bug (like me) (third picture)

lines.text: Hang a logn piece of wire to the inverted 'U' from the back side of the mousetrap (first picture).
lines.text_raw: Hang a logn piece of wire to the inverted 'U' from the back side of the mousetrap (first picture).

lines.text: Hang another long piece of wire of the inversed 'U' from the middle of the mousetrap (left) (second picture).
lines.text_raw: Hang another long piece of wire of the inversed 'U' from the middle of the mousetrap (left) (second picture).

steps.title: Attach the trigger to the relay and the relay to the battery holder.

lines.text: First attach the positive wire of the battery holder to the relay (schema and second picture).
lines.text_raw: First attach the positive wire of the battery holder to the relay (schema and second picture).

lines.text: Then attach one of the wire to the relay (schema and last picture) and then you have done the the trigger part.
lines.text_raw: Then attach one of the wire to the relay (schema and last picture) and then you have done the the trigger part.

lines.text: Attach a little piece of wire to the n.c. contact of the relay to the positive side of the battery holder (schema and second picture).
lines.text_raw: Attach a little piece of wire to the n.c. contact of the relay to the positive side of the battery holder (schema and second picture).

lines.text: Then attach a long piece of wire to the com. from the relay and another long piece of wire to the ground of the battery holder (schema and last picture).
lines.text_raw: Then attach a long piece of wire to the com. from the relay and another long piece of wire to the ground of the battery holder (schema and last picture).

lines.text: Then you have finish the circuit.
lines.text_raw: Then you have finish the circuit.

guide.summary: This alarm just makes a big boom when it's turned on .
guide.title: Super Boom Alarm
